correct_text:
[10] Rosen,  E.,  "Exterior  Gateway  Protocol,"  IEN-209,   Bolt
          Beranek and Newman Inc., August 1982, not issued.
notes: RFC823 references IEN-209, which was not issued, and won't be (https://www.rfc-editor.org/ien/scanned/ien209.pdf).  I encourage discussion of whether it should reference RFC827 instead.
